subject: Soccer
UEFA Champions League (Soccer)
lead_paragraph: Cristiano Ronaldo scored both goals as visiting Real Madrid beat Lyon, 2-0, to advance to the knockout stage of the Champions League with four wins in four games, and without conceding a goal.
snippet: Cristiano Ronaldo scored both goals as visiting Real Madrid beat Lyon, 2-0, to advance to the knockout stage of the Champions League with four wins in four games, and without conceding a goal.
